creator: med1985@gmail.com
text:
The "break-after" (and "break-before") attribute is only implemented for <fo:block> and not for <fo:table>. 

Most probably it isn't implemented for some of the other objects for which the "break-after" or "break-before" attributes is valid.

creator: med1985@gmail.com
text: This relates to bug# 42600 though a different use case.
*** Bug 51068 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: med1985@gmail.com

text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: rtf is no longer actively maintained; if a patch is submitted, it will be considered for application
batch transition resolved+wontfix to closed+wontfix; if you believe this remains a bug and can demonstrate it with appropriate input FO file and output PDF file (as applicable), then you may reopen
